amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in the Congressional Record to change the short title to Strategic Production and Conservation Response Act and add conservation requirements to the plan.

action.text: Mr. Walberg raised a point of order against the Thompson (CA) amendment (A029). Mr. Walberg stated that the provisions of the amendment exceeds the scope of the bill and the amendment is therefore, not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Thompson (CA).
